reviewText: Excellent, didactic work on a connecting way to practice YOGA a balance of timing and holding ASANAS to create a state of mind !!!

This DVD is so nice- relaxing and also a great workout.  I like how each of the poses are briefly stalled so the viewer can check their posture.  I am not sure what anyone could find to criticize this DVD.  Full endorsement- blessings...

This DVD is not worth the money.  What a total disappointment this was.  I read some of the other reveiws and thought this would be a great addition to my collection.  This will go into the next book sale we have here at my office to raise money for charity!
